content: I think these suggestions are really helpful. I've been trying to be more open and honest with my friend, and I've been making an effort to listen to their perspective more. I've also been trying to focus on the positive aspects of our friendship and show my appreciation for them. However, I've been struggling with feelings of inadequacy and self-doubt lately, especially when I compare myself to others on social media. Do you have any advice on how to overcome these feelings and focus on my own goals and achievements?
